General.Name: Equity Commonwealth
General.Description: Equity Commonwealth (NYSE: EQC) is a Chicago based, internally managed and self-advised real estate investment trust (REIT) with commercial office properties in the United States. EQC's portfolio is comprised of four properties totaling 1.5 million square feet.
General.Address: Two North Riverside Plaza, Chicago, IL, United States, 60606
